NAME : Codeine CHEMICAL NAME : (5alpha,6alpha)-7,8-Didehydro-4,5-epoxy-3-methoxy- 17-methylmorphinan-6-ol ALTERNATE CHEMICAL NAMES : methylmorphine, morphine monomethyl ether CHEMICAL FORMULA C 18 H 21 NO 3 MOLECULAR WEIGHT 299.37 MELTING POINT 154-156° (monohydrate) From the Merck Index 12th Edition

                    Context: 
                    This section provides detailed pharmacological information about codeine, including chemical names, formula, molecular weight, melting point, and source, within the Erowid "Pharms" database. It is relevant for users seeking scientific data on controlled substances and drug chemistry. The content includes identifiers and citation details, aiding precise search and reference.
